title: Control
description: On the run from an abusive and controlling man, Zia lands in Chicago where she gains a new group of friends. They introduce her to powers she never knew existed. Telepathy and mind control. As she becomes comfortable with her ability, an intriguing stranger warns her that things may not be as simple as they appear. Her life quickly begins to unravel, leaving her to try and figure out who is actually in control.
author: J.L. Ethridge
